name: nkeys.js
description: A public-key signature system based on Ed25519 for the NATS ecosystem in javascript

scripts.fmt: deno fmt src/ examples/ modules/ test/ node_test/
scripts.cjs: deno run --allow-all --unstable bin/cjs-fix-imports.ts -o build/ src/ modules/cjs/ node_test/
scripts.stage: npm run init && npm run cjs && tsc
scripts.prepare: npm run stage && deno bundle --unstable modules/esm/mod.ts nkeys.mjs && tsc
scripts.test: npm run prepare && ava --verbose && deno test --allow-all --unstable test/
scripts.doc: npm run clean && rm -Rf docs && npm run stage && node_modules/.bin/typedoc --out docs/ && touch ./docs/.nojekyll

author: The NATS Authors
